price: (51) Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā lananṣuru rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wayawma yaqūmu al-ashhādu
